page.title: 15Tourism in St.Leonards
page.content: As our area is only 2 miles from the sea we get lots of{visitors.}Mostly these come for the day,or to stay with relatives.In our section we have 3 Caravan Sites, 2 Hotels, a Motel,and some Bed and Breakfast places. Beauport and Crowhurst{Caravan Parks are in the middle of woodland, and are attractively set out. They have good shops which our Mums use sometimes. They give work for local people running and cleaning the sites. {Beauport Park Hotel}is quite large, with lovely grounds; it is only 3 miles from the sea.{High Beech Motel is nearby and just off the A.21 road from London.{Bed and Breakfast}(from Â£7.00 a night) is very popular. From Easter to September many{foreign {students}come to Hastings to learn English.Lots of families in Hollington have students staying.It's interesting
